```{r setup}
library(helpeR)
library(dplyr)
```

# Cleaning the gradebook
1. Download the CSV. 
```{r, eval=FALSE}
csv <- "example-gradebook.csv"
```
2. Run 
```{r, eval=FALSE}
gradebook <- clean_gradebook(csv)
gradebook
```

# Adding grade
```{r}
data("gradebook")
gradebook |> 
  mutate(
    grade = get_grade(myuni_total)
  ) |> 
  select(myuni_total, grade) |> 
  arrange(myuni_total)
```

# Filling grade-roster

You can use the empty grade-roster and final totals to fill grade book
```{r, eval=FALSE}
fill_grade_roster(gradebook, "grade-roster.xlsx")
```
